bug.summary: HarvesterGUI sometimes slips the black image into the sequence of valid images.
bug.description:
Describe the bug HarvesterGUI sometimes slips the black image into the sequence of valid images. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Launch Harvester GUI. Start image acquisition. You'll see the black image is slipped into the sequence of valid images.
Expected behavior HarvesterGUI must display only valid images.
